Information: Fraction of raw sludge removed from aerboic treatmeant plants
Notes: See V5, C6, Equation 6.3B and Table 6.6A in 2019R IPCC GNGHGI. Increasing this factor can represent investments in upgrades to aerobic treatment (or new facilities).

Variable: Biogas Recovery Factor at Wastewater Treatment Plants
Information: Fraction of biogas recovered from treatment
Fraction the population managing their septic tank in compliance with the sludge removal instruction of their septic system

Variable: Biogas Recovered from Wastewater Treatment Plants

Information: Total mass of sludge produced from wastewater treatment (aerobic and septic treatment pathways) in tonnes
Notes: Total mass of sludge produced, which then is sent to the solid waste model.
